subject: EUROPEAN CENTRAL BANK (ECN)
body:
EUROPEAN CENTRAL BANK (ECN)
60640 FRANKFURT AM MAIN GERMANY.
We hereby officially notify you about the present arrangement to pay
you, your over due Winning Prize/inheritance fund which you could not
complete the process of the release of your transfer pin code through
the Digitized Payment System. and you have spent a lot of money and a
lot of time sending money to different people just to make sure you
receive your fund and after setting it up and doing nothing.
We have decided to pay your funds through (ATM VISA Card) This
arrangement was initiated/constituted by the European Central Bank,
United Nation and Paris Club, due to fraudulent activities going on
within the world.
The European, United Nations and Paris Club introduced this payment
arrangement to enable our Contract ,Winning Prize, inheritance
beneficiary to receive their fund without any interference. The ATM
VISA Card was contracted and powered by GOLD CARD WORLD WIDE. The ATM
VISA CARD is credited with the sum of 20.5 Million Euro , it is
already loaded in the Master Card which you can use to access your
fund in any ATM Stand/location worldwide and remember that the maximum
withdrawal daily limit is Ten Thousand EURO (US €10,000.00)we have
concluded delivery arrangement with the below courier services
companies and their delivery time is stated below.
DHL=4hrs/€250.00
FedEx Express=7hrs/€100.00
UPS=9hrs/€150.00
KINDLY RECONFIRM YOUR FULL INFORMATION FOR THE DELIVERY.
Your Full Name................
Your Home Address..............
Your Country...............
Your current Phone Numbers ..............
Your Cell Numbers...............
Your personal identification
............
Once it gets to us the package will be delivered to your destination.
Kindly state in your response to this text and let me know which
courier company you would want us to use for the shipment of your ATM
VISA Card to you and do not forget to drop your What's app number for
faster communication.
Yours sincerely,
Mr. Gary Jones
Best Regards
Email..  
europeancentralban8@gmail.com

subject: Re: EUROPEAN CENTRAL BANK (ECN)
body:
Hello Mr. Gary Jones,

Thank you for reaching out to me! I'm thrilled to hear about this opportunity. It's not every day that one gets notified about such a significant sum of money.

I'm curious, how was I selected for this? And could you please explain more about the Digitized Payment System? I've never heard of it before and would love to understand it better.

Also, could you provide more details on how the ATM VISA Card works? Is there any fee associated with using it?

As for the courier service, I have had good experiences with DHL in the past. However, before we proceed further, could you tell me more about the delivery process and if there are any costs involved?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Patrick

subject: Re: EUROPEAN CENTRAL BANK (ECN)
body:
Attention: Patrick

I received your email with thanks and understanding. I would like to inform
you that your total winning prize is a United Nations inheritance fund
deposited with the European Central Bank and programmed to be delivered to
you via ATM card funds.

So I want you to know that your entire balance worth 20.5M on Master Card
will be ready and available to be delivered to your destination as soon as
you follow us now by reconfirming your complete details , select the
delivery company of your choice and return Contact us immediately so that
we can proceed with the delivery of your bank card balance without any
further delay, because this is the only way everything is in order now.

Now I advise you to contact us after receiving this email so that we can
proceed with the processing immediately.

We have entered into a delivery agreement with the courier companies listed
below and their delivery time is shown below.



*DHL=4 hours/€250.00FedEx Express=7 hours/€195.00UPS=9 hours/€200.00*

Once we receive it, the package will be delivered to your destination.
Please indicate which in your response to this text
Select the courier company you would like us to use to ship your ATM VISA
card to you and don't forget to provide your What's App number for faster
communication.
Your,
Mr. Gary Jones
Best regards

subject: Re: EUROPEAN CENTRAL BANK (ECN)
body:
Hello Mr. Gary Jones,

Thank you for your email and the exciting news about the United Nations fund! I'm really thrilled to hear that my prize is ready to be delivered via an ATM card.

I have a few questions though, if you don't mind. Could you please explain how this whole process works? How was I selected for this prize? And why is it being delivered via an ATM card?

As for the courier company, I think DHL would be a good choice. They've always been reliable in my experience. 

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Patrick

subject: Re: EUROPEAN CENTRAL BANK (ECN)
body:
Attn:  Patrick

We received your email with thanks. I want you to know that your ATM Card
Funds will be delivered to you without any delay , And I want you to know
that your email was selected for the lucky winner in our list. That is why
you are among the choosing one to receive the Funds . I want you to know
that we have another option of releasing your Funds to you , if you wish we
can transfer your Funds through Bank to Bank wire transfer it depends on
your choice ok.

So i want you to get back to us once you receive this mail if you are ready
to receive your Funds so i will provide the payment details where you will
send the required 250.00 euros to enable us meet up with DHL Courier
Service to register your ATM Card Funds immediately for the delivery ok.

I will advise you to follow up the instructions because that is the only
thing delaying your Funds now .

I will be waiting for your response ,
Thanks
Mr. Gary.

body:

subject: Re: EUROPEAN CENTRAL BANK (ECN)
body:
Hello Mr. Gary Jones,

Thank you for your email and the exciting news about the United Nations fund! I'm thrilled to hear that my balance is ready to be delivered via an ATM card.

As for my WhatsApp number, I'm afraid I don't use that app. Is there another way we can communicate quickly?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Patrick

subject: Re: EUROPEAN CENTRAL BANK (ECN)
body:
Attn:  Patrick

I received your email with thanks,I want you to know that your ATM Card
Funds daily withdrawal limit  is 100.000.00EUR  .I want you to know that
you can also use it to transfer your Funds online to your private account
as well .

I want you to know that you will be withdrawing 10.000.00 euros once in any
ATM Card around you , I want you to know that the best delivery company we
have is DHL COURIER SERVICE AND FEDEX COURIER SERVICE so i will advise you
to choose one and get back to me so we can proceed with the delivery of
your ATM Card Funds immediately .

So i will advise you to reconfirm your full details now ok. I will be
waiting for your urgent response .
Thanks
Mr. Gary.

subject: Re: EUROPEAN CENTRAL BANK (ECN)
body:
Hello Mr. Gary,

Thank you for your email. It's quite interesting to hear about this ATM card and the funds associated with it. I'm curious, how does this process work? And why is the daily withdrawal limit set at euros once?

Also, could you please explain more about transferring funds online to my private account? How secure is this method?

Regarding the delivery services, DHL and FedEx are indeed reputable companies. Could you tell me more about their delivery procedures for something as important as an ATM card?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Patrick
